Scientits:

"Lord Perseus... it's a great honor to see you here... " said a=
 scientist whose was in elevator
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: rm=
2kmidi 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, August 21, 2005 3:49 =
PM
  Subject: Lord Perseus


  Lord Perseus needed to get out of the base, =
he had been inside too long.  He decided that he would go to the tower and =
visit some of the scientists there.  He had always been welcome there and t=
hey usually had interesting things to tell him.  He enjoyed learning about =
new things. 

  The Pasificus base was located near the edge of Atlantis.  =
Although they greatly disliked conflict, their base was built just as stron=
g as any other military base.  He liked to walk when he was in the city, be=
cause people were always happy to see him and it was good to maintain good =
relations with the people that he had sworn to protect.  As he walked throu=
gh the garden-like boulevard leading to the tower, citizens waved at him an=
d he was greeted warmly.  Atlantis was a beautiful and friendly city. 

  H=
e arived at the tower and the police guards there gave him a polite salute.=
  They were not obligated to do so, but he was respected by everyone, espec=
ially the police with whom he often worked closely to help maintain order i=
n the city.  In the lobby, he punched the button on the elevator and door s=
lid open a moment later.  A few people got off, and Lord Perseus got on.  H=
e pushed a button and the elevator took him to the floor of one of the larg=
er research laboratories.
